title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed in a different format in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.
2. Display the values in a dynamic text item.
3. Display the values in a data/text item.
4. Compare the formats of the datetime values in both items.
